marketplaces.name: aesir-marketplace
marketplaces.repo_description: Aesir Systems Claude Code plugin marketplace

files.README.md:
# Aesir Systems Claude Code Marketplace

Claude Code plugin marketplace from [Aesir Systems](https://github.com/aesirsystems).

## Add this marketplace

```
/plugin marketplace add aesirsystems/claude-marketplace
```

## Available plugins

| Plugin | Description |
|--------|-------------|
| [breadcrumbs](https://github.com/aesirsystems/claude-breadcrumbs) | Context preservation across compactions (prepare-compact, restore-context) |
| [statusline](https://github.com/aesirsystems/claude-statusline) | Enhanced statusline with model, auth, git/path, context bar, duration, churn |

## Install

```
/plugin install breadcrumbs@aesir-marketplace
/plugin install statusline@aesir-marketplace
```

plugins.name: statusline
plugins.description: Enhanced statusline with model, auth, git/path, context bar, duration, and churn
